content:
The Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine reported on the destruction on March 30, 2024 of the managed aviation missile X-59, the SuperCam reconnaissance drone and Lancet drum drone.

This is stated inmessageAPS.

"During the day of March 30, 2024, a managed X-59 Air Air Force, Supercam, and Lancet UAV, was destroyed by the forces and air defense of the South Air Command.

In this case, the Armed Forces also posted a video.

As reported by the Armyinform, in the defense forcestoldAbout the missile terror of the Russians in the south of Ukraine.
title: The Armed Forces of the Armed Forces reported on the destruction of X-59, SuperCam and Lacet
